{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.14911v1", "title": "Lusztig sheaves, decomposition rule and restriction rule", "summary": "In this article, we realize the subquotient based modules of certain tensor
products or restricted modules via Lusztig's perverse sheaves on multi-framed
quivers, and provide a construction of their canonical bases. As an
application, we prove that the decomposition and restriction coefficients of
symmetric Kac-Moody algebras equal to the dimensions of top Borel-Moore
homology groups for certain locally closed subsets of Nakajima's quiver
varieties.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT,math.AG,math.QA", "published": "2025-04-21T07:31:09Z"}
